channel.title: C++ on The Hungry Wonderer
channel.description: Recent content in C++ on The Hungry Wonderer

item.title: Speeding up loops - a brief foray into C++ using Rcpp
item.description: Introduction One of the best things about R (and open source in general), is that you get to ride on the back of some really, really clever contributions of others. For the R community, Hadley Wickhamâ€™s ggplot and dplyr packages are legendary. However, one equally (in my opinion, at least) amazing package is Rcpp, written by Dirk Eddelbuettel. Why is this such an amazing package? In a nutshell, it allows R users to harness the power of C++ functions with comparative ease.
